languages.text: На оружейной стойке находится древний цепной меч без топливного мотора. Форма зубьев наталкивает на мысли об Ульма Универсалис — паттерне времен Анжуйского похода.

traits.locale_text: На оружейной стойке находится древний цепной меч без топливного мотора. Форма зубьев наталкивает на мысли об Ульма Универсалис — паттерне времен Анжуйского похода.

languages.text: An ancient-looking chainsword without a fuel engine rests on the weapon rack. The shape of its teeth makes you think of the Ulma Universalis, a pattern from the Angevin Crusade era.
languages.original_text: На оружейной стойке находится древний цепной меч без топливного мотора. Форма зубьев наталкивает на мысли об Ульма Универсалис — паттерне времен Анжуйского похода.

traits.locale_text: An ancient-looking chainsword without a fuel engine rests on the weapon rack. The shape of its teeth makes you think of the Ulma Universalis, a pattern from the Angevin Crusade era.
The shape of this ancient chainsword's teeth and its hefty hilt make you think of the Ulma Universalis, a design from the Angevin Crusade era.
An ancient-looking chainsword without a fuel engine rests on the weapon rack. The shape of its teeth makes you think of the Ulma Universalis, a pattern from the Angevin Crusade era.

A polished bolter rests on a bed of velvet. Its peculiar design reminds you of the Ulma Universalis — a limited edition made for the since-lost temple world of Solis IV. This weapon is clearly just a harmless reconstruction of the outer casing.
An ancient-looking chainsword without a fuel engine rests on the weapon rack. The shape of its teeth makes you think of the Ulma Universalis, a pattern from the Angevin Crusade era.
The shape of this ancient chainsword's teeth and its hefty hilt make you think of the Ulma Universalis, a design from the Angevin Crusade era.
The shape of this ancient chainsword's teeth and its hefty hilt make you think of the Ulma Universalis, a pattern from the Angevin Crusade era.
An ancient-looking chainsword without a fuel engine rests on the weapon rack. The shape of its teeth makes you think of the Ulma Universalis, a pattern from the Angevin Crusade era.
An ancient-looking chainsword without a fuel engine rests on the weapon rack. The shape of its teeth makes you think of the Ulma Universalis, a pattern from the Angevin Crusade era.
An ancient-looking chainsword without a fuel engine rests on the weapon rack. The shape of its teeth makes you think of the Ulma Universalis, a pattern from the Angevin Crusade era.

languages.text: Una antigua espada sierra sin motor yace en el expositor. La forma de sus dientes te recuerda a la Ulma Universalis, un patrón de la era de la Cruzada de Angevin.
languages.original_text: An ancient-looking chainsword without a fuel engine rests on the weapon rack. The shape of its teeth makes you think of the Ulma Universalis, a pattern from the Angevin Crusade era.

traits.locale_text: Una antigua espada sierra sin motor yace en el expositor. La forma de sus dientes te recuerda a la Ulma Universalis, un patrón de la era de la Cruzada de Angevin.

Un bólter pulido descansa en una cama de terciopelo. Su peculiar diseño te recuerda a la Ulma Universalis: una edición limitada fabricada para el ya perdido mundo templo de Solis IV. Esta arma no es más que una reconstrucción inofensiva de su armazón exterior.

languages.text: 燃料エンジンのない、古めかしいチェーンソードが武器棚に置かれている。その歯の形状は、アンジェヴィン十字軍時代のウルマ・ユニヴェルサリスの紋様を彷彿とさせる。
languages.original_text: An ancient-looking chainsword without a fuel engine rests on the weapon rack. The shape of its teeth makes you think of the Ulma Universalis, a pattern from the Angevin Crusade era.

traits.locale_text: 燃料エンジンのない、古そうなチェーンソードが武器棚に置かれている。その歯の形は、アンジェヴィン十字軍時代の紋様であるウルマ・ユニヴェルサリスを思い出させる。
磨かれたボルターがベルベットのベッドに置かれている。その独特なデザインは、失われたソリスIVの神殿世界のために作られた限定版で、ウルマ・ユニヴェルサリスを彷彿とさせる。この兵器は明らかに、外殻を無害に復元しただけのものだ。

languages.text: 武器架上放着一把古老的链锯剑，它的燃油发动机已经不见了。链锯剑锯齿的形状不禁让你想起“至高天光”这种图案设计，这种设计源于安杰文神圣远征时代。
languages.original_text: An ancient-looking chainsword without a fuel engine rests on the weapon rack. The shape of its teeth makes you think of the Ulma Universalis, a pattern from the Angevin Crusade era.

traits.locale_text: 武器架上放着一把古老的链锯剑，它的燃油发动机已经不见了。链锯剑锯齿的形状不禁让你想起“至高天光”这种图案设计，这种设计源于安杰文神圣远征时代。
一把抛过光的爆矢枪放在天鹅绒床上，独特的枪身设计让你想起了“至高天光”这把枪。那是一把限量版爆矢枪，专门为了纪念失落的神殿世界索利斯四号星，而眼前这把武器，显然只是毫无杀伤力的仿真版模型。

languages.text: Ein offenbar altes Kettenschwert ohne Antrieb liegt auf dem Waffenregal. Die Form seiner Zähne erinnert dich an das Ulma Universalis, ein Muster aus der Zeit des Anjou-Kreuzzuges.
languages.original_text: An ancient-looking chainsword without a fuel engine rests on the weapon rack. The shape of its teeth makes you think of the Ulma Universalis, a pattern from the Angevin Crusade era.

traits.locale_text: Ein offenbar altes Kettenschwert ohne Antrieb liegt auf dem Waffenregal. Die Form seiner Zähne erinnert dich an das Ulma Universalis, ein Muster aus der Zeit des Anjou-Kreuzzuges.

Ein polierter Bolter ruht auf einem Bett aus Samt. Sein besonderes Design erinnert dich an die Ulma Universalis – eine limitierte Edition für die seitdem untergegangene Tempelwelt Solis IV. Diese Waffe ist offenkundig nur ein harmloser Nachbau des äußeren Gehäuses.

languages.text: Sur le râtelier d'armes repose une épée tronçonneuse visiblement ancienne dont le moteur a disparu. La forme de ses dents vous rappelle l'Ulma Universalis, un motif datant de l'époque de la Croisade d'Angevin.
languages.original_text: An ancient-looking chainsword without a fuel engine rests on the weapon rack. The shape of its teeth makes you think of the Ulma Universalis, a pattern from the Angevin Crusade era.

traits.locale_text: Sur le râtelier d'armes repose une épée tronçonneuse visiblement ancienne dont le moteur a disparu. La forme de ses dents vous rappelle l'Ulma Universalis, un motif datant de l'époque de la Croisade d'Angevin.

Un bolter poli repose sur un coussin de velours. Sa forme particulière vous rappelle l'Ulma Universalis, une édition limitée créée spécialement pour le monde-temple Solis IV, depuis disparu. Il s'agit ici d'une simple reproduction inoffensive.

languages.text: Yakıt motoru olmayan kadim bir görünüme sahip motorlu kılıç, silah rafına dayanmış. Dişli kısmının şekli, aklına Angevin Seferi dönemindeki bir model olan Ulma Universalis'i getiriyor.
languages.original_text: An ancient-looking chainsword without a fuel engine rests on the weapon rack. The shape of its teeth makes you think of the Ulma Universalis, a pattern from the Angevin Crusade era.
